q3: I love cold weather, can't wait until fall.
q4: How is Mexico this time of year?
a4: Mexico is a huge country and the weather varies by season and region. The optimum time to visit is generally between December and April, when there is virtually no rain. The coolest months are between December and February, while the wet season begins in the south in May and lasts until October.
